parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The bills of the burstable clean bandwidth that are issued before this point in time are queried. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: EntityObject
parameters.description:
The IP address of the instance.

> You can call the [DescribeInstanceDetails](~~91490~~) operation to query the IP addresses of all instances.

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description:
The type of the system log. Set the value to **20**, which indicates the billing logs for the burstable clean bandwidth.

> You must specify this parameter. Otherwise, the call fails.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The bills of the burstable clean bandwidth that are issued after this point in time are queried. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.
